title: Door Gasket for Whirlpool Refrigerator
install_steps: Pull the old gasket from the channel
Warm the new gasket to improve flexibility
Press the new gasket into the channel starting from the corners
Close the door and check the seal

title: Upper Rack Wheel Kit for Whirlpool Dishwasher
install_steps: Press new wheel kit in place
Slide rack in and test movement
